com.pb.sawdust.util.property

Class PropertiesPlus

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • com.pb.sawdust.util.property.PropertiesPlus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class PropertiesPlus
extends java.util.Properties
    The PropertiesPlus class provides a simple augmentation of the standard Properties class. It provides methods for getting properties as certain types, as well as throwing an exception when a property does not exist (as opposed to returning null).

    Usually it is preferable to use PropertyDeluxe instead of this class, but if the circumstances find that class to be problematic or overly complex, then this one can provide additional functionality with little effort.

    See Also:
